name: halt
author: Bichlmeier Christoph, Bielang Michael, Schmid Steffen

scripts.package:win: npm run build && copy "package.json" "dist/" && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --overwrite
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && copy "package.json" "dist/" && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=linux --arch=x64 --overwrite
scripts.package:osx: npm run build && copy "package.json" "dist/" && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --overwrite
scripts.package:all: npm run build && copy "package.json" "dist/" && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --all --arch=x64 --overwrite
